{{Wired embedded system |brand=ChipPC |model=Xtreme PC EX7552NG |revision=C |asin= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=thin client |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Netlogic Microsystems |cpu1_model=Alchemy Au1550 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=SanDisk |fla1_model=SDED7-256M-N9 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=3 |jtag= |serial=yes,, DE-9,, |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8201BL |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Audio Codec;Cirrus Logic;CS4202JQZ;BAA2AL1019;1; ,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3243C;;1; ,,, 4-Port USB Hub Controller;Texas Instruments;TUSB2046B;7CAIF4W G4;1; ,,, DVI Video Controller;;SM722GF8 AB;1035 MTGMA P90X7.01 F6DT;1; ,,, DVI Transmitter;Silicon Image;Sil164CTG64;VN801.1-1 1032 0.1;1; ,,, Smart Card Reader;SCM Microsystems;STC II-B 108190;KB619 C0519;1; |flags=DVI, VGA, Audio in/out (3.5mm) |stock_boot= |stock_os=Windows;Embedded CE;6.0; |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:05:35 }} '''ChipPC Xtreme PC EX7552NG'''
:Smart Card Reader chip is attached via a daughterboard.
"Xtreme PC EX-NG Main Board Rev. D1" and "CPC04267" :is silkscreened under daughterboard.
